backend/main.mo: Defines a CustomOrder type, stores orders in a list, and exposes submit and query endpoints with timestamp‑based sorting.
feature_evidence.json: Aggregates feature reports referencing frontend files, their purposes, and associated test IDs for build verification.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides human-written summaries for all frontend components, pages, hooks, and utilities used in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base setup defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode overrides, and global background/text styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts, metadata, favicon assets, and bootstrapping the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router and maps all routes to pages within a SiteLayout wrapper.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer component with brand info, contact links, attribution, and dynamic year display.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Layout wrapper combining TopNav, page content, and SiteFooter into a full‑page structure.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Responsive navigation bar with logo, desktop links, and a mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/Section.tsx: Reusable Section and SectionHeader components providing spacing, animations, and typography utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that initializes and refreshes the backend actor based on Internet Identity authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for submitting custom orders and fetching all custom orders through an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles, theming variables, dark mode settings, and custom animations.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function for merging Tailwind and conditional class names.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/BookmarkCollectionPag: Renders a bookmark collection page with pricing, descriptive text, and a feature grid.
frontend/src/pages/BouquetCollectionPage: Displays bouquet types with tiered pricing and a section for pipe cleaner bouquets.
frontend/src/pages/CustomizedCardCollect: Displays customized event card offerings with pricing, description, and an occasions grid using icons and styled sections.
frontend/src/pages/CustomOrdersPage.tsx: Implements a custom order form with submission handling, success feedback, and Instagram CTA.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with a hero section, brand visuals, category cards, and a 'why choose us' feature list.
frontend/src/pages/PolaroidCollectionPag: Shows polaroid product sizes with prices and descriptions in a styled grid layout.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for the project's design system.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing site structure, design goals, required features, and current implementation state.
